title: BRIEF-Tongding Interconnection Information to issue up to 1 bln yuan bonds
text:
BRIEF-Tongding Interconnection Information to issue up to 1 bln yuan bonds Sept 11 
Sept 11 Tongding Interconnection Information Co Ltd 
* Says plans to issue up to 1 billion yuan ($156.92 million) bonds 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1F0PIY6 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3726 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
